audioText: J'ai presque fini mon travail aujourd'hui.
question: How much of the work has the person completed?
explanation: The text states 'J'ai presque fini mon travail aujourd'hui' - I have almost finished my work today. The adverb 'presque' means 'almost' or 'nearly'. When someone says 'j'ai presque fini', they mean they have nearly finished their work but haven't completely finished it yet.
